en.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: on your mobile device to join in
en.PLAY_DESCRIPTION: Present your idea, jumping in allowed
en.EVERYBODYS_IN: Waiting for %s to start the game!
en.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORVIP: Waiting for {VIP} to start the game!
en.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORGAMEPAD: Waiting for the game to start!
en.CONNECTING_DELAY:
This is taking a while…
Please check your internet connection.
en.CONTROLLER_PRESENTATION_START: You can use the pointer to highlight your presentation.
en.CONTROLLER_DOODLE_DONE: You’re done, please wait for the other players to make their selection.
en.CONTROLLER_PLEASE_WAIT: Wait for other players to vote.
en.CONTROLLER_JUMP_IN_TITLE: If you think that you can do better than %s, jump in!
en.CONTROLLER_JUMPED_IN: You could be next! Listen to %s’s presentation.
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_1: Can you see what I see right there, right there
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_2: I’ll point it out, do you agree, No? Don’t care
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_4: I’ll show you what, why and where
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_5: Don’t cut me off—wait your turn
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_9: I want you to let me finish
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_10: Cast your vote for me to win it
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_11: Time is running out so send it
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_12: When you jump in I will end it
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_17: Which puppy cheated on its math test?
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_18: Which spoon bought itself some fake breasts?
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_19: Which washing machine makes its own wine?
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_20: And where’s the butt on the butcher’s twine?
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_22: Study the lineup, circle, vote–high score!
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_23: Reveal your humor so deranged and dark
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_24: Use your laser pointer so you make a mark
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_25: Hide your eyes: this isn’t clean
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_26: A monstrosity of illustrations on your screen
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_27: Can’t stop me I’m jumping in
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_28: Jump out if you hate argumentation
en.CREDIT_LYRICS_29: I’ll explain if you would just....
en.TD_WAITING_FOR_VIP: Waiting for %s to start the game...
en.NASTINESS_LEVEL_NASTY_DESCRIPTION: Mostly nasty content, functionally identical to 'Just Nasty' upon starting second game with 'Same Players'
en.NASTINESS_LEVEL_JUST_NICE_DESCRIPTION: 100% nice content, original bugged behaviour for 'Less Naughty'
en.NASTINESS_LEVEL_JUST_NORMAL_DESCRIPTION: 100% naughty content, original bugged behaviour for 'Normal'
en.NASTINESS_LEVEL_JUST_NASTY_DESCRIPTION: 100% nasty content, original bugged behaviour for 'Nasty'
en.NUMBER_OF_DRAWINGS: For 3-4 player games, you’ll do FOUR drawings

fr.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: sur votre appareil mobile pour rejoindre
fr.QUIT_DESCRIPTION: Retour vers le choix du jeu
fr.EVERYBODYS_IN: En attente du lancement de la partie par %s !
fr.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_CANSTART: Appuyez lorsque tout le monde est prêt
fr.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORVIP: En attente du lancement de la partie par {VIP} !
fr.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORGAMEPAD: En attente du lancement de la partie !
fr.CONNECTING_DELAY:
Cela prend du temps…
Veuillez vérifier votre connexion Internet.
fr.SKIP_TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: Permet de passer la section didacticiel.
fr.CONTROLLER_PRESENTATION_START: Vous pouvez utiliser le pointeur pour souligner votre présentation.
fr.CONTROLLER_LISTEN_TO_PRESENTATION_YOU_RE: Vous passez après ! Écoutez la présentation de %s.
Vous avez fini ! Écoutez la présentation de %s.
fr.CONTROLLER_DOODLE_DONE: Vous avez fini, attendez que les autres joueurs fassent leur choix.
fr.CONTROLLER_PLEASE_WAIT: Attendez que les autres joueurs votent.
fr.CONTROLLER_JUMP_IN_TITLE: Si vous pensez pouvoir faire mieux que %s, intervenez !
fr.CONTROLLER_JUMPED_IN: Vous passez peut-être après ! Écoutez la présentation de %s.
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_1: je crois qu'on voit tous la même chose ici
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_2: Regardez mieux vous êtes d'accord ? Non ! Tant pis
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_4: pourquoi faut il que je justifie
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_5: Me coupez pas chacun son tour
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_9: J’aimerais que vous me laissiez J’aimerais, j’aimerais
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_10: Votez que je gagne la partie (j’aimerais)
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_11: C’est la fin du temps imparti (j’aimerais)
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_12: Quand vous jouerez moi j’aurais fini !
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_17: Lequel des chiots a triché au Bac ?
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_18: Quel plat  s’est chopé des morbac’
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_19: Quel lave-linge fait un bon panaché ?
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_20: Et qui se fume la feuille du boucher ?
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_21: Plus c’est fou et plus on gagne
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_22: c’est au vote qu’on peut décrocher la timbale
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_23: Révèle ton humour qu’il soit trash ou sombre
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_24: Utilise ton pointeur pour sortir du nombre
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_26: Il faut détourner le regard ou t’attendre au pire
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_27: On ne m'arrête pas quand je me lance
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_28: si tu n’aimes pas tenter ta chance,
fr.CREDIT_LYRICS_29: sors du jeu mais sache bien que
fr.TD_SCOREBOARD_PLAYER: %s est à la %s place, avec %d points.
fr.TD_PLAYER_BANNED: %s a été banni(e) de la partie.
fr.TD_WAITING_FOR_VIP: En attente du lancement de la partie par %s ...
fr.PLAY_REMOTE_DESCRIPTION: Un jeu plus rapide, pas besoin de parler
fr.NUMBER_OF_DRAWINGS: Pour des parties de 3-4 joueurs, vous ferez QUATRE dessins.

it.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: sul tuo dispositivo mobile per partecipare
it.PLAY_DESCRIPTION: Illustra la tua idea, si può sempre intervenire
it.EVERYBODYS_IN: In attesa che %s avvii la partita!
it.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_CANSTART: Premi quando tutti i partecipanti sono pronti
it.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORVIP: In attesa che {VIP} avvii la partita!
it.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORGAMEPAD: In attesa che la partita inizi!
it.CONNECTING: Connessione ai servizi di Jackbox Games
it.CONNECTING_DELAY:
L'operazione sta impiegando più tempo del previsto...
Controlla la connessione a Internet.
it.CONTROLLER_PRESENTATION_START: Puoi utilizzare il cursore per evidenziare la presentazione.
it.CONTROLLER_LISTEN_TO_PRESENTATION_YOU_RE: Tra poco tocca a te! Ascolta la presentazione di %s.

it.CONTROLLER_PLEASE_WAIT: Aspetta che gli altri giocatori votino.
it.CONTROLLER_JUMP_IN_TITLE: Se pensi di poter fare meglio di %s, provaci pure!
it.CONTROLLER_JUMPED_IN: Potrebbe toccare a te tra poco! Ascolta la presentazione di %s.
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_2: Forse sono un po' astratte, vabbè
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_5: Dai che lo so che 'sta foto
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_9: Dai si gioca a Let me finish
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_10: Di' che pensi e poi arrossisci
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_11: No non serve che ti indigni
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_17: Qual è il PC che sputa sempre?
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_18: Che gru si vuol rifar le tette?
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_19: Qual è il supplì che non si lava mai?
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_20: Dov'è la chiappa di questi ghiacciai?
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_23: Il mio humor ti fa rider dai
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_24: Usa il laser per indicare poi vai
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_25: Apri gli occhi e trovi qui
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_26: Una mostra che fa invidia pure a Dalì
it.CREDIT_LYRICS_28: Se vuoi litigare dai prego fatti sotto

it.TD_WAITING_FOR_VIP: In attesa che %s avvii la partita...
it.PLAY_REMOTE_DESCRIPTION: Ritmo più rapido, non serve parlare
it.NUMBER_OF_DRAWINGS: Nelle partite con 3-4 giocatori, QUATTRO disegni

de.CONNECTING: Verbindung mit Jackbox Games-Diensten wird hergestellt
de.CONNECTING_DELAY:
Das dauert ungewöhnlich lang …
Bitte überprüfe deine Internetverbindung.
de.CONTROLLER_PRESENTATION_DONE: Du bist mit deiner Präsentation fertig.
de.CONTROLLER_PRESENTATION_START: Du kannst mit dem Pointer Aspekte deiner Präsentation hervorheben.
de.CONTROLLER_LISTEN_TO_PRESENTATION_YOU_RE: Du bist als Nächstes an der Reihe! Höre der Präsentation von %s zu.
Du bist durch! Höre der Präsentation von %s zu.
de.CONTROLLER_DOODLE_DONE: Du bist durch. Bitte warte, bis die anderen Spieler gewählt haben.
de.CONTROLLER_PLEASE_WAIT: Warte, bis die anderen Spieler abgestimmt haben.
de.CONTROLLER_JUMP_IN_TITLE: Geh dazwischen, wenn du denkst, du kannst das besser als %s!
de.CONTROLLER_JUMPED_IN: Du könntest als Nächstes dran sein! Höre der Präsentation von %s zu.
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_1: Kannst du sehen was ich dort seh', dort seh'?
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_2: Ich zeig mal drauf, stimmst du mir zu? Nein? Don’t care!
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_4: Ich zeig dir wo, wie und mehr
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_5: Quatsch mir nicht rein — kommst gleich dran
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_9: Lass mich doch zum Ende kommen
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_10: Wählst du für mich hab ich gewonnen
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_11: Die Zeit wird knapp, ist fast verronnen
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_17: Welcher Hund kann nicht gut Mathe?
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_20: Und wie knallst du echt geil Bananenschalen?
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_22: Schau dir alles an und wähl was Gutes aus!
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_23: Zeig uns Humor so krank und abgefahren
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_24: Mit dem Laserpointer hat es noch mehr Charme
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_26: Eine Zeichnung nach der anderen, was ist schon dabei
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_28: Sei still wenn du nicht streiten magst, ich weiß
de.CREDIT_LYRICS_29: es besser, lass mich doch nur ...
de.NEW_CONTENT_FEATURES: JETZT MIT NEUEN INHALTEN UND FEATURES!
de.NUMBER_OF_DRAWINGS: In Spielen mit drei bis vier Spielern erstellt ihr VIER Zeichnungen

es.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: en tu dispositivo móvil para unirte
es.PLAY_DESCRIPTION: Presentad una idea. ¡El resto puede intervenir!
es.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_CANSTART: Pulsa cuando todo el mundo esté listo
es.CONNECTING: Conectando con los servicios de Jackbox Games
es.CONNECTING_DELAY:
Es raro que tarde tanto…
Comprueba tu conexión a internet.
es.CONTROLLER_PRESENTATION_START: Puedes resaltar tu presentación con el cursor.
es.CONTROLLER_LISTEN_TO_PRESENTATION: Presta atención a la presentación de %s.
es.CONTROLLER_LISTEN_TO_PRESENTATION_YOU_RE: ¡Te toca! Presta atención a la presentación de %s.
¡Se acabó! Presta atención a la presentación de %s.
es.CONTROLLER_DOODLE_DONE: Ya has terminado. Espera a que el resto elija.
es.CONTROLLER_PLEASE_WAIT: Espera a que el resto vote.
es.CONTROLLER_JUMP_IN_TITLE: ¡Participa si crees que tienes más salero que %s!
es.CONTROLLER_JUMPED_IN: ¡Ahora podría tocarte a ti! Presta atención a la presentación de %s.
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_1: ¿Tú estás viendo eso que yo veo?
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_2: Es justo ahí, ¿cómo no puedes verlo?
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_12: Sigue así y haré que acabes
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_19: ¿Qué máquina sabe hacerse su propio vino?
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_20: Y este rollo, ¿dónde tiene las nalgas?
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_22: Mira bien y vota, y así ganarás
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_23: Ve a lo bestia, no lo pienses más
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_24: Coge tu puntero y ponte a señalar
es.CREDIT_LYRICS_26: Las imágenes que has visto debes olvidar
es.TD_PLAYER_JOINED: %s se ha unido a la partida.
es.TD_PLAYER_BANNED: Se ha echado a %s de la partida.
es.TD_WAITING_FOR_VIP: Hay que esperar a %s para empezar...
es.PLAY_REMOTE_DESCRIPTION: Partida rápida. ¡No hace falta ni hablar!
es.NUMBER_OF_DRAWINGS: Haréis CUATRO dibujos. Para 3 a 4 jugadores.

es-XL.JOIN_ON_YOUR_DEVICE: en tu dispositivo móvil para unirte.
es-XL.PLAY_DESCRIPTION: Presenta tu idea, se puede interrumpir
es-XL.QUIT_DESCRIPTION: Volver a la selección de juego.
es-XL.EVERYBODYS_IN: ¡Esperando a %s para que empiece el juego!
es-XL.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORVIP: Esperando a que {VIP} inicie la partida.
es-XL.LOBBY_STATUS_MESSAGE_WAITINGFORGAMEPAD: Esperando a que inicie la partida.

Esto está tardando un poco...

es-XL.CONTROLLER_DOODLE_DONE: Terminaste. Espera a que elijan los demás jugadores.
es-XL.CONTROLLER_PLEASE_WAIT: Espera a que voten los demás jugadores.
es-XL.CONTROLLER_JUMP_IN_TITLE: Si crees que puedes hacerlo mejor que %s, ¡inténtalo!
es-XL.CONTROLLER_JUMPED_IN: ¡Te podría tocar a ti a continuación! Escucha la presentación de %s.
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_1: ¿Ves ahora lo que yo estoy viendo?
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_2: Es justo ahí, ¿cómo no puedes verlo?
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_12: De una vez haré que acabes
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_19: ¿Qué máquina sabría hacer su propio vino?
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_20: Y este rollo, ¿dónde tiene las nalgas?
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_22: Mira bien y vota, y así ganarás
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_23: Ve a lo bestia, no lo pienses más
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_24: Toma tu puntero y ponte a señalar
es-XL.CREDIT_LYRICS_26: Las imágenes que viste tienes que olvidar
es-XL.TD_PLAYER_BANNED: Se expulsó de la partida a %s.
es-XL.TD_WAITING_FOR_VIP: Esperando a %s para que empiece el juego...
es-XL.PLAY_REMOTE_DESCRIPTION: Jugabilidad más rápida, no es necesario hablar
es-XL.NUMBER_OF_DRAWINGS: Para juegos de 3 a 4 personas, harán CUATRO dibujos

pt-BR.PLAY_DESCRIPTION: Apresente sua ideia, a entrada é permitida
pt-BR.CONNECTING: Conectando-se aos serviços da Jackbox Games
pt-BR.CONNECTING_DELAY:
Está demorando...
Verifique a sua conexão à internet.
pt-BR.CONTROLLER_PRESENTATION_START: Use o ponteiro para destacar a sua apresentação.
pt-BR.CONTROLLER_LISTEN_TO_PRESENTATION_YOU_RE: É você em seguida! Ouça a apresentação de %s.
pt-BR.CONTROLLER_DOODLE_DONE: Tudo certo. Agora aguarde os outros jogadores terminarem.
pt-BR.CONTROLLER_JUMP_IN_TITLE: Você acha que faz melhor que %s? Chega mais!
pt-BR.CONTROLLER_JUMPED_IN: Pode ser você em seguida! Ouça a apresentação de %s.
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_1: Você viu o que eu vi? Bem ali, bem ali.
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_2: Vou te mostrar, deu pra notar? Não? Tô nem aí.
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_4: Eu te mostro o quê, onde e por quê.
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_5: Não me interrompe, o que cê disse
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_10: Sei qual é o seu predileto
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_11: O tempo corre, vem cá votar
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_18: E qual colher fez cirurgia plástica?
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_20: Onde é a raba dessa árvore de Natal?
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_22: Vai, escolha, vote e vença seus rivais
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_23: Mostre o seu humor tão safadinho
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_24: Use essa caneta laser pra marcar bem bonitinho
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_25: Feche os olhos pra não ver
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_26: Tanta imagem insinuante diante de você
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_28: Sai pra lá quem não quer argumentar
pt-BR.CREDIT_LYRICS_29: Eu explico se você deixar eu…
pt-BR.PLAY_REMOTE_DESCRIPTION: Jogabilidade mais rápida, não precisa falar nada
pt-BR.NUMBER_OF_DRAWINGS: Em jogos de 3-4 jogadores, vocês farão QUATRO desenhos
